name: course-project
description: For this project you must work alone to build a backend application consisting of a RESTful JSON API for a contact us form [_(examples)_](https://www.jotform.com/form-templates/category/contact-form) you'll be building out in a later class. All persistent data is to be stored in a simple JSON file that’s operated on through Node’s `fs` module.
author: GroupC
